abstract: Andrea Mitchell, NBC News correspondent and wife of the former Fed Chairman Alan Greenspan, has for years kept her potential conflict of interest in check.
snippet: Andrea Mitchell, NBC News correspondent and wife of the former Fed Chairman Alan Greenspan, has for years kept her potential conflict of interest in check.
lead_paragraph: Alan Greenspan’s name has come up dozens of times on MSNBC in the last month, but never during the 1 p.m. hour. That’s the hour anchored by Andrea Mitchell, who is married to Mr. Greenspan, the former chairman of the Federal Reserve.

headline.main: For Greenspan’s Wife, Covering the Financial Crisis Is on a Case-by-Case Basis
headline.print_headline: For Andrea Mitchell, Covering the Financial Crisis Is on a Case-by-Case Basis
